Summary: Sighted Triangle Shaped Object For 30 Minutes
divs: Sighting Details (you can type over theseinstructions.)Please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typedpage). My wife and I were driving home, north on highway 99. We saw the objectnear the Ashlan exit, appx 3 miles before our normal exit. It hovered over thetrain tracks along the highway. when we pulled along side it my wife said itmade no noise. It started moving NE. We got off the highway at our normal exitwith the UFO in sight. We detoured, now driving Se, to catch up to it. We caughtup to it on San Jose street, near Brawly. It was just hovering there. We stoppedthe car and both got out. It hovered for 5 - 10 seconds, no noise at all. Thatis when I noticed the three distinct corners with different light colors, red,blue26 white. It then stared off NW towards our home. We went home with the objectin sight, grabbed a pair of binoculors, and I watched it until losing it overthe NW horizon.
trends: There have been 63 other sightings in Fresno
There were no other sightings in Fresno on or around August 28th 2000
